00019 #ifndef NUMBERER_H
00020 #define NUMBERER_H
00021 
00022 #define NOTFOUND -1
00023 #define ENDOFVECTOR -1
00024 
00025 // this class give a number to each element of a set of vectors of positive 
00026 // integer
00027 class numberer{
00028         public : 
00029         // create a numberer that can number at most n vector of size s
00030         numberer(int n, int s){;};
00031         
00032         // destructor
00033         virtual ~numberer(void){;};
00034         
00035         // insert the vector v of size s
00036         virtual const short insert(const short s, const short * v)=0;
00037         
00038         // return the number of different elements
00039         virtual const short getNbOfDiffNumbers(void) const =0;
00040         
00041         // clear the numberer
00042         virtual void clear(void)=0;
00043         
00044         protected :
00045 };
00046 
00047 #endif
